answers.answer: Now I don't have gestational diabetes, but I'm 36weeks & have gained 40lbs.
I called My glucose test and had to go back today for the 3hr test. ... I've gained close to 20lbs so far I'm 30 wks... I've bn wondering if that's bad for the baby
My friend that had gestational diabetes gained a total of 25lbs.
I actually lost 25-30 pounds cause of the strict diet! but I was 235 to begin with. lol

I started at 195 lbs and I know weigh 189... I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes 1 week ago and have lost 3 lbs since my last appt (last Wednesday, my 1 week follow up was today)... I'm 30 weeks 1 day but she said I was measuring 31 weeks 3 days (so 9 days bigger), but that was measuring my belly... I go back in 2 weeks for my next ultrasound to see what she is measuring at for sure... I wonder if ill gain weight or lose weight by my next appt
Oh just noticed, we are due the same day!!! :)
Im 30 weeks and put 3 stone on well rhat was when i was 27 weeks at 28+3 i was measuring 36 and baby weighes about 3lb 6  i eat healthy but struggle to keep my glucose levels dwn even with a salad
I'm 31+3 with GD. I've only gained 16 pounds so far.
I've gained 23 lbs and I'm 32 weeks. Diagnosed with GD 2 weeks ago. My baby is measuring one week bigger

I am 29 weeks today and I was diagnosed w/ gd. No family history of it. I am 31 with my first baby girl. I am measuring on track. Gained 23 pounds so far. But baby is 3 lbs according to US three days ago.
I just did my 3 hr so we shall see. I'm 33 weeks and gained 7 lbs.

question: How much weight have you mommys gained due to having DB? I WAS 149 before this pregnancy (3rd) I am now 181 :(  (I'm 30 weeks & 1 day but measuring 35)
title: gestational diabetes
